WorkItem.Description:
Hi,  
   I used this library to convert SVG image to PNG/JPG , but the resulting image has portion of blurs. Text part is rendered great, but graph part of the image is blurred. Attached the generated jpg image.

Any ideas how I can fix it?

Code: 
SvgDocument svg = SvgDocument.Open(imagePath);
svg.Draw().Save(imagePath + ".jpg", ImageFormat.Jpeg);

thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Image loaded from SVG is has blurs in it
